description: Changes the state of a signing profile to REVOKED. This indicates that signatures generated using the signing profile after an effective start date are no longer valid.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: The name of the signing profile to be revoked.

parameters.name: profileVersion
parameters.description: The version of the signing profile to be revoked.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: The reason for revoking a signing profile.

parameters.name: effectiveTime
parameters.description: A timestamp for when revocation of a Signing Profile should become effective. Signatures generated using the signing profile after this timestamp are not trusted.
